title: ExoMars Rover
subtitle: ExoMars Rosalind Franklin Mission
paragraphs: The European Space Agency's ExoMars rover is part of a series of missions designed to study the potential for past life on the Red Planet.

metadata_table.value: Provide clues about the potential for life on Mars
